<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Giant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=79" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder Encounter: Heaving Kobolds](/Sources.aspx?ID=65) pg. 0</row>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +1

**Con** +4

**Int** -2

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -1
</row>

[Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 65

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +14 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d6+8 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +14 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +9 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 piercing

**Toss Kobold** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Requirements** A [kobold](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=65) is within 10 feet of the ogre; **Effect** The ogre picks up the kobold and hurls it at another creature within 30 feet. This ranged Strike has a +14 attack modifier and deals 2d8+6 bludgeoning damage. The kobold takes half the damage dealt to the target and is [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).

</column>
